meaningMnemonic: Your <radical>private</radical> <radical>leader</radical> is <kanji>Buddha</kanji>. You don't feel the need to tell everyone. But when you're alone you give your time to Buddha and let him lead your life.
readingMnemonic: Your private <kanji>Buddha</kanji> is a little different than other people's idea of him. Your Buddha is wearing <reading>boots</reading> (ぶつ). They're big and rubber, and they look fabulous on him.
